textBox.richText: We have been derelict in posting pictures. This has something to do with having too much work, but also a certain lack of energy and focus. Let’s catch up. First, pictures from our 2007 Summer in Geneva. Anton went to his first whole-week-away-from-home camp in Geneva. We drove him to the meeting place where he went with Yves’ daughter Oceane. He hugged Nadia and happily went off. It was great, he did not cry at all. Nadia loved Les-Bains-des-Paquis in Geneva where she read comics in French and bathed.Natasha and Deda Slava came to Geneva and the children enjoyed playing with them. Babi was clearly Anton’s favorite. [N] Nadia’s birthday was like a three stage rocket. We had a small birthday at our house with a cake. But then we also went to American Girl’s place in Chicago. Nadia and her doll Molly were treated to a nice dinner with a cake and candles. Celine, Anton, Dad and Mom attended. We went to the Chicago Pier and played mini-golf and ate ice cream. Nadia’s cake was on the back porch of our house. Finally, her main birthday was held at a pool in the Best Western hotel. All of her friends came and played for hours. [M] Pot pourri. Nadia and Olga spent a couple of days in Seattle. We had fun at home. The CS department made a new picture of Jan. The Kids played soccer and went to Taekwondo. Jan went to Montreal for the OOPSLA conference. Halloween. [O]  The week before Christmas we went to Punta Cana in the Dominican Republic. This was a wonderful break from the cold and dreary Indiana winter. We loved ClubMed and would go back there any day. [L]
